text: Amber Valletta (February 9, 1974, Phoenix, Arizona) is an American movie and television program actress and model. She started as a model for fashion agencies. She appeared in movies including Hitch (2005), The Spy Next Door and the television series Revenge. Her acting career began around 1993. ==References== Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Phoenix, Arizona Category:Models from Phoenix, Arizona Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:American television actors Category:American television personalities Category:American vegetarians
title: Amber Valletta
